title: Tank Damage early game should be addressed
body:
Lets be honest here. Tanks should not be dueling people. Really at any point in the game. They should be a supportive class where they are reliant on their team.

EDIT: This is coming from a 100K Mastery Warwick Player. Its kind of silly I can run down an ADC at all points of the game for pretty much free. Like they need to be a 6/0 Cait or Lucian for me to even be worried.

replies.body:
Warwick is not a tank.

What tank is absolutely 100-0ing you without a chance of surviving?
lol dumb shit can’t tell the difference between a Warwick and an actual tank like Alistar or Nautilus.

> [{quoted}](name=The entire team,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OoUbudXE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-11-28T06:05:56.621+0000)
>
> lol dumb shit can’t tell the difference between a Warwick and an actual tank like Alistar or Nautilus.

I'd honestly even see his point a little bit about earlygame damage if he said a real tank (cough {{champion:516}} cough) but cmon man. Warwick was the example? Saying that is like asking for downvotes.
Warwick is not even _close_ to a tank, and you clearly dont have 100k mastery, or probably ever played the champ. Lmao.

warwick is a tank. the only damage item that is commonly built on him is a Titanic. If your definition for a tank is that they cannot commonly build even one off tank item then there is like 1 tank in the entire game.

early game is fine, most champs are on even ground, and havent started assuming their builds yet, this means you cant just bully a tank away from cs as they actually have a fighting chance until around 2nd item
additionally leagues idea of tanks is kinda warped, in most games tanks cant be outdueled by anything except for specialized tank busters, this is due to their defenses outscaling most damage, so in reality, you should never be outdueling a tank as anyone minus a tank buster, but since leagues tanks are so squishy its sad, they need the early game
